title: Calories in 12 Raw Oysters
meta_description: Learn calories in 12 raw oysters, plus protein, carbs, fat, sodium details, per-oyster nutrition, and preparation tweaks for accurate tracking.
assumptions: Medium-sized raw oysters (about 12 g edible meat each), shucked, no sauces, lemon, or additives; Pacific variety.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by oyster type (e.g., Pacific vs. Eastern), size, freshness, and harvesting location. Consult local sources or labels when available.

quick_answer.text: 12 medium raw oysters offer ~144 kcal and ~17 g protein, low in fat and carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tsp cocktail sauce per oyster
Larger oysters (20 g meat each vs. 12 g)

faqs.q: How many calories in one raw oyster?
faqs.a: About 12 kcal for a medium raw oyster.

faqs.q: Are raw oysters high in protein?
faqs.a: Yes, 12 raw oysters provide ~17 g protein, a good lean source.

faqs.q: What's the sodium content in 12 raw oysters?
faqs.a: Approximately 960 mg, due to natural seawater content.

faqs.q: Do raw oysters have carbs or fiber?
faqs.a: Low carbs (~8.4 g total for 12) and 0 g fiber.

faqs.q: How does oyster size affect calories?
faqs.a: Larger oysters add more calories; small ones fewerâ€”adjust based on actual weight.
